about_the_game:
The ANNUAL PASS gives you instant access to lots of additional content for TENNIS WORLD TOUR 2:

  • The Roland-Garros tournament, the Tie Break Tens tournament, the Madrid Open and the Halle Open, all included in the OFFICIAL TOURNAMENTS & STADIA pack
  • 2 additional players from the SOFIA KENIN & KAROLINA PLISKOVA pack
  • 2 additional players from the JUAN MARTIN DEL POTRO & VICTORIA AZARENKA pack
  • The ATP Cup, the players ANDY MURRAY, DONNA VEKIC, MARIN CILIC, JUSTINE HENIN, MARIA SHARAPOVA and DIEGO SCHWARTZMAN, and additional official equipment and outfits from the CHAMPIONS pack.
detailed_description:
The ANNUAL PASS gives you instant access to lots of additional content for TENNIS WORLD TOUR 2:

  • The Roland-Garros tournament, the Tie Break Tens tournament, the Madrid Open and the Halle Open, all included in the OFFICIAL TOURNAMENTS & STADIA pack
  • 2 additional players from the SOFIA KENIN & KAROLINA PLISKOVA pack
  • 2 additional players from the JUAN MARTIN DEL POTRO & VICTORIA AZARENKA pack
  • The ATP Cup, the players ANDY MURRAY, DONNA VEKIC, MARIN CILIC, JUSTINE HENIN, MARIA SHARAPOVA and DIEGO SCHWARTZMAN, and additional official equipment and outfits from the CHAMPIONS pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650, 3.2 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-650, 3.2 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2 GHz
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHz | AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: The ANNUAL PASS ensures you always have the latest TENNIS WORLD TOUR 2 content. The first DLC unlocked is the OFFICIAL TOURNAMENTS & STADIA pack, which will be followed by other content, including new official players.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
